cast.name: 拉杜·安德烈·米库 Radu Andrei Micu
克里斯蒂安·索夫龙 Cristian Sofron
克里斯蒂安·雅各布 Cristian Iacob
弗拉迪米尔·格伊坦 Vladimir Gaitan
塞尔玖·尼古拉耶斯库 Sergiu Nicolaescu
都铎·蒙特亚努 Tudor Munteanu

writer.name: 塞尔玖·尼古拉耶斯库 Sergiu Nicolaescu

director.name: 塞尔玖·尼古拉耶斯库 Sergiu Nicolaescu

introduction: 这是二战后，摩尔多瓦当了数年的政治囚犯。监狱里，俄罗斯上校最喜爱的娱乐是让犯人玩俄罗斯轮盘赌。摩尔多瓦用令人难以置信的运气和幸存 者的精神熬过了艰难的拘留时光。之后，这个走出监狱的前警察加入了一个国际俄罗斯轮盘赌非法游戏巡回。70年代末，信念带他来到中欧小镇戈德堡。渐渐的，摩尔多瓦碰到许多熟悉的面孔，朋友和敌人。似乎整个布加勒斯特从40年代以来的黑社会都要在这里碰头了。After WWII, "Comisarul Moldovan" (Sergiu Nicolaescu / Petr Falc) spent years as a political prisoner of the communist regime. The favorite entertainment of the Russian Colonel in charge of the prison was to have the inmates play Russian Roulette. Only his unbelievable luck and survivor spirit helped Moldovan live through his detention. Out of the prison the ex-policeman joins an international Russian Roulette illegal gaming circuit. In late 70's faith brings him to a Central Eurpean town where Goldberg (Vladimir Gaitan / Cristian Motiu), an old acquitance of his is organising an "improved" version of the game where two opponents are shooting each other. Step by step Moldovan meets lots of familiar faces, both friends and enemies. It looks like the whole Bucharest's underworld from the 40's chose to meet here.
